edu.up.cs301.game.infoMsg
Class BindGameInfo

java.lang.Object
  edu.up.cs301.game.infoMsg.GameInfo
      edu.up.cs301.game.infoMsg.BindGameInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BindGameInfo
extends GameInfo

A message from the game to a player that tells the player: - who the game is - what the player's ID number is (i.e., player 0, player 1, etc.)

Version:
July 2013
Author:
Steven R. Vegdahl
